stimulusHtml: In the Paleolithic cave painting shown from Lascaux, the artist likely used which of the following to color the large reddish area within the horseâ€™s body?

features.html: Pictures from History/Bridgeman Images

choicesHtml: An early fresco technique, in which pigments were applied with a brush to a wet surface
A dotted-field technique, in which many dots were applied close together with a wax crayon
A spray-painting technique, in which diluted pigments were blown onto the rock surface
An early printing technique, in which clay slip was applied to the wall with terra cotta stamps
